column2: Meager
This character is insufficient at many tasks.
Short
This character is shorter than most.
Tall
This character is taller than most.
Melodious
This character has a voice like an angel.
Proficient
This character has a natural talent for many tasks.
Fluent
This character has a clear and coherent voice.
Feeble
This character is unhealthy and susceptible to illness.
Resilient
This character is especially resistant to illness.
Barren
This character is infertile, having children will be especially hard for them.
Fertile
This character is fertile, having children will be especially easy for them.
